info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:52PM EDT until May 23 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MOORE...EAST CENTRAL DAVIDSON...EASTERN MONTGOMERY...RANDOLPH AND WESTERN CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 251 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles south of Thomasville to near Asheboro to 6 miles east of Biscoe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... High Point, Asheboro, Randleman, Siler City, North Carolina Zoo, Biscoe, Goldston, Seagrove, Archdale and Trinity. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
